1.title: The First Yo

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: When darkness falls over Union City, a group of teenagers are chosen to fight against chaos brought on by the world's imbalance by using YO KWON DO, an ancient fighting style that combines martial arts with yo-yo trickery.

2.title: The Second Yo

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: One of Scott's friends is infected with Dark Energy when he touches a mysterious rock, giving the Blazing Team their first big challenge. Belloc wants the rock shard for himself, but when Johnny tries to stop him, he gets more than he bargained for.

3.title: Balancing Act

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: A terrible magician with delusions of grandeur gets infected by a Dark Shard allowing him to pull Dark Energy out of his hat that he passes off as magic. Meanwhile, Parker's practice of Yo Kwon Do to the exclusion of all else draws the ire of his mother.

4.title: Double Trouble

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: A sleazy real estate mogul sets his sights on owning the Blazing Team HQ- high rise by any means necessary, using a newly created double-black yo- yo (given to him by Belloc) as a means to this end. Meanwhile, Wilson's obsession with Lao Shi's past lands him and Parker in hot water in a rough part of town.

5.title: The Greatest Yo on Earth

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: When a circus ringmaster and his star elephant are infected with Dark Energy, Wilson and Parker must learn to value each other's contributions and work together in order to stop their rampage through Union City.

6.title: Such a Lonely World

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: An aspiring cook has his recipe stolen by an established chef. Infected by a Dark Shard that covers his body in mystical dark flame, he seeks his revenge. Meanwhile, Maddie learns that there's such a thing as too much truth.

7.title: Not So Great Scott!

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: An ambitious TV weather girl becomes infected with a shard which gives her the power to control the weather. Meanwhile, Scott enjoys the Team's newfound fame and notority too much, leading him to slack off his Yo Kwon Do practice and put his teammates in danger.

8.title: The Tiger by the Tail

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: When seismologist DAN ANDREAS is infected with Dark Energy, he develops the ability to cause earthquakes when he punches the ground. The Blazing Team is already on unsure footing when Belloc joins the fight, revealing Johnny as his protege. Maddie is injured in the ensuing battle. Parker gets a power-up that saves his teammates but could ultimately doom him.

9.title: Blind Spot

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: The team faces off against a shard-infected nosey neighbor with a thousand eyes as Wilson struggles with his obsession over gadgets, technology, and the internet.

10.title: When Fanboys Attack

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: We meet OTTO KRUMHOLZ, the Team's biggest fan. When he's shunned and mocked by Wilson, a one-time friend, Otto finds himself imbalanced and infected by a dark shard, whose power he uses to wreak technological havoc. This keeps the Team busy while Belloc collects more shards for a diabolical plan.

11.title: Lonely at the Top

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Scott's hero, extreme athlete JACK FALCON, is infected by a shard that lets him make copies of himself at will. As Falcon wreaks havoc on everyone who's pulling him in different directions, Scott struggles with his single-minded focus to be the leader of the Blazing Team.

12.title: Strong Like Wilson

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: A disgruntled professional wrestler is recruited by Belloc. His totem is a raging bull. Wilson learns that his size can be an asset and powers up.

13.title: A Rock and a Shard Place

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Archeologist HANK CROFT finds a geode filled with dark shards. In a multi- shard infections, he turns into a rock monster and rages across Union City. In an effort to stop Hank's rampage, Parker and Scott form an uneasy alliance with Belloc and Johnny.

14.title: Muscle Beach

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: A puny wannabe lifeguard gets infected by a shard, which gives him the power to merge with sand to give him the body (and strength) he covets to finally be noticed. Meanwhile, Maddie joins the lifeguard team and makes a new friend.

15.title: This Eagle Has Landed

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: Scott's desire to power up his yo-yo ends up getting him infected by a Dark Shard and giving him the power to fly. When the team finds out and tries to stop him he sets off to find and defeat Johnny to prove that he's still one of the good guys, and it's up to Parker to bring him down to earth.

16.title: Yo-Rassic Park

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: The museum curator is re-assigned to the Paleontology dept. and blames Yo Kwon Do for the demotion. She is infected by fossilized shards at a dig, allowing her to manipulate the dinosaur bones and seek her revenge. Meanwhile, Parker sets off to bring Johnny back into the fold.

17.title: Yo-Tomatic for the People

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: A teen inventor's yo-yo wielding robot gets infected by dark energy and wreaks havoc on the city. Wilson begins to believe that his and the Blazing Team's time is too valuable to waste on every little problem.

18.title: Into the Light

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Parker loses control of his Darkness-infected yo-yo, making the Blazing Team's job that much harder when they must stop a teenage boy infected by a Light Shard, giving him the power to re-order his world to be like his favorite video game.

19.title: The Longest Shard

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Maddie enters a mixed martial arts tournament where she faces an old Kung Fu rival who has since trained in a variety of styles. Bested my Maddie yet again, her rival becomes infected by a dark shard, giving him the power to stretch his body like Plastic Man, a power he uses to great effect in the tournament. Meanwhile Scott and Wilson wonder why Lao Shi and Parker are avoiding them.

20.title: A Spy for a Spy

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: With Belloc and Shaw confirmed to be one and the same, Lao Shi sends Parker on a dangerous mission to stay close to their enemy and learn as much as he can about Belloc�۪s plan. Meanwhile, Johnny returns to the Blazing Team, regretful for his behavior and wanting a second chance... or does he?

21.title: Return of the Corn Dog

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: Light Shard-infected food court worker uses his newly-acquired telekinesis to stand up for himself against an overbearing boss. Wilson, likewise, has trouble standing up for his ideas when the team makes plans to stop Belloc.

22.title: Jumping Jack Shard

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: A youth center volunteer is infected by the Darkness, giving him the power to teleport. When he uses his new power against his sleazy landlord, the Scorpion from the Order of Anarchy, the Blazing Team must step in and stop them both.

23.title: Blaze-y Like a Fox

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: The team meets MARTINA, a light-shard-collecting, double-white yo-yo wielding Yo Kwon Do fighter, who reveals Lao Shi�۪s role in the destruction of the Nexus. Lao Shi admits the truth about what happened many centuries ago... and knows it is up to him to deal with Martina, whose shard-collecting activity in Union City troubles him greatly.

24.title: Race to the Finish

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: A shard infection gives a teenage race car driver the power to absorb energy. Not trusting Lao Shi after discovering he destroyed the Nexus, the team turns instead to the racer's father to help them stop the boy.

25.title: The End, So Far...

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

25.plot: Lao Shi is captured trying to stop Belloc from powering up the dark half of the Nexus. Belloc sends the Order of Anarchy across Union City to distract the Blazing Team while he deals with Lao Shi. The team realizes what's happening and gets to the Nexus just in time to see Belloc reactivate the Black Nexus Stone and release a terrible surprise.

26.title: Enter the Black Dragon

episode of.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (TV Series 2015– )

26.plot: Lao Shi and Yao Long finally face off at the Nexus, with dire consequences for Lao Shi. In the wake of the battle, the team escapes with Lao Shi's yo- yo, so Johnny goes after it to prove his worth to Yao Long. Meanwhile, Yao Long begins working at the Nexus to put the next wave of his reign of darkness into motion. Martina joins the team in an effort to help lead them in Lao Shi's absence, encouraging them to fight for the side of Light if they want to win this war.

imdb.plot outline: Trained by master Lao Shi, a band of teenage heroes united by the mysterious sacred art of Yo Kwon Do, must learn to reach their full potential as the forces of light and darkness become a constant and increasing threat to their society. While the teams goal is ultimately keep the two opposing forces in harmony, they learn quickly that the real battle often lies in themselves as they begin to struggle to avoid falling prey to the very natures they swore to keep in check.
imdb.title: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do
akas: Blazing Team: Masters of Yo Kwon Do (China)

production companies.name: CJ E&M Film Financing & Investment Entertainment & Comics

While the teams goal is ultimately keep the two opposing forces in harmony, they learn quickly that the real battle often lies in themselves as they begin to struggle to avoid falling prey to the very natures they swore to keep in check.::Jut Tut
